sources.title: Secrets of the Underground
sources.description: Title: Secrets of the Underground Summary: With the help of a WAAC group, Mr. District Attorny smashes a Nazi spy-ring that is selling counterfeit War Stamps and Bonds. Directed by: William Morgan Actors: John Hubbard, Virginia Grey, Lloyd Corrigan Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 18 December 1942 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 With the help of a WAAC group, Mr. District Attorny smashes a Nazi spy-ring that is selling counterfeit War Stamps and Bonds.
